mapper.select: select ptnr_id ig_id, policyholder_nm ig_client, suim_accept_no report_id, suim_close_no result_id, bd_type, report_1 ,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(reg_date), '%Y/%m/%d') reg_date ,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(close_date), '%Y/%m/%d') end_date from top_suitability_17 where user_no= #{user_id} and close_date >= unix_timestamp(#{fromdate}) and close_date < unix_timestamp(#{todate}) order by close_date desc
